name: GlassCounter
0:
”Alexa, tell Glass Counter I drank a glass”
”Alexa, tell Glass Counter add one”
”Alexa, ask Glass Counter what is the count”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: glass counter
des: This skill helps you keep track of all the glasses of water you have drunk and tells you when you have reached the ideal 8 glasses a day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
